features: This set of full-size utensils are made for durable 18/0 stainless steel, designed for everyday use
The compact storage container allows the silverware to nest together, taking up very little space in your lunch bag
This nesting case is made of polypropylene, and is BPA-free
All pieces are dishwasher safe (top rack only) for easy and quick clean up
The case measures 7. 9-inch wide by 2. 4-inches high by 1-inch deep
Ths nesting case is made of polypropylene, and is BPA-free
The case measures 7.9-inch wide by 2.4-inches high by 1-inch deep
body.description: Take your meals on the go with this Gourmet utensil set from BUILT. The full-size utensils are made of 18/0 stainless steel, and nest inside the BPA-free polypropylene case. This four piece set includes a fork, knife, spoon, and storage case. These utensils are perfect for taking in a lunchbox or camping. Even better, they are dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. Case -- 2-1/4 L" x 8" W x 1-1/8" H

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hydration We know you’ve got a lot going on, so take your drinks on the go. Lunch Bags Bringing your own lunch has never been more fashionable. Welded Collection Whether you’re tailgating, having a beach party, or making a grocery run we’ve got you covered. Food Containers Innovative solutions for lunch on the go.

Built was founded on the belief that a good design makes everyday life more enjoyable. Our goal is to create design focused products that meet the demands of life on the go. We offer clean unencumbered designs that are reduced to their purest essence and we believe in rich and vibrant colors and patterns to compliment a range of personalities and style. From our beginning we have aims to create products that work as good as they look and believe that through the innovation of everyday items we can make the world more enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good that someone stole mine-
reviews.reviewText: I loved this set so much! I have come to re-purchase this set as someone at my job loved it as much as I did, and stole it. ☹️. I had to go into my orders to find the exact set, as I have purchased others that were not as good. The cutlery is of good quality, heavy, and fits neatly in the guide of the travel box. They clean up wonderfully, and the case is easy to find in my cluttered work bag. Like them so much, I have ordered extra to give as gifts(not for my co workers! At least not until I find out who stole mine). Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nicely designed
reviews.reviewText: Designed well (doesn't even make a noise if you shake it). Holds the silverware just fine without it rattling and the packing order is easy to remember.Whole lot can go through the dishwasher (I use top most rack in our 3 rack dishwasher) and still looks new after multiple uses.Bought more sets to have available

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The set is great! Great quality of silverware and solid carrying case! My only complaint is not being able to fit all 3 in the carring case so that it latches. I have tried rearranging it every way I possibly can and still can't latch the lid. I never use need the knife so I leave it out and it meets my standards just fine. Despite this small flaw, I liked the set enough that I went ahead and ordered 4 more sets for my husband and kids' lunchboxes. All had this same flaw, but it's fine since none of us need the knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy little set
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set at a store on a whim and loved it! Somehow it got lost during a move, and I had to go find the same exact set. It’s handy, space saving, and the case keeps things clean and away from touching other things in my purse. I keep this so I don’t use plastic silverware when I go out to events or the market, but it’s also been helpful when I’ve gotten take out and I want to sit outside to eat but they forgot to give me a fork. It’s a great brand and a great set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great set, good idea, case latch needs improvement
reviews.reviewText: I took off 2 stars because the case (which is sturdy and has a perfect roundish compact size) won't close as other reviews mentioned. It is almost impossible to keep closed even if you remove the spoon (the problem is the latch won't stay). So if you are cool with it, just use a rubber elastic band around to hold it if you don't want the cutlery all over the place in your bag. Otherwise it's a good price-quality item and quite modern/elegant for lunchbag accesories. The cutlery is nice, the knife is rounded (perfect for people that have security scanners at the workplace). I would buy these again (even with the problematic latch).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and value
reviews.reviewText: I love this cutlery. The utensils are sturdy and feel high quality for the price. I like how the case keeps the utensils elevated so I don’t feel like I need to wash the case every time I use it. I put the utensils inside in the order of fork, spoon, then knife on top and I’ve had no issues with closing the case like some reviews mentioned. It fits nicely in my Packit lunch bag. All in all a great buy and much cheaper than the Oxo one I originally looked at.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this portable flatware
reviews.reviewText: This portable flatware is very versatile...from camping scenario to workplace lunch utensils. The case provides a nice secure place to keep the flatware in 1 place and you don't have to worry about the fork or knife puncturing anything. Great product. As a side note, this would be a great "gift" to give someone who likes camping or needs workplace utensils in their desk drawer or lunch bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect so you don't have to waste disposable plastics every day.
Bonjour, mon conjoint m’a dit qu’il les aimait. Elles sont résistante et elle viennent avec une boîte de rangement.

Buen artículo a secas. La verdad, un estuche para lápices con cualquier juego de cubiertos dentro hace la misma función, y tal vez sea más barato. No cierra del todo, yo usé una liga primero y una bolsa de tela para gafas después.

reviews.reviewTitle: Clip poorly designed and/or manufactured BUT is dishwasher safe
reviews.reviewText: As others have pointed out, the clip comes undone very easily, defeating the purpose of keeping dirty cutlery from going all over your lunchbox or bag.However, all parts are dishwasher safe, unlike 99% of products in this category. Get a large bulldog clip or similar to use with this item.It's the best of a bad bunch, unfortunately.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buenas y no se oxidan
reviews.reviewText: Practicas, resistentes y no se oxidan caben en todas las bolsas y si no quieres llevarte elnestuche puede ponerlos aparte buen producto!!
